amendment.description: An amendment No. 13 printed in Part A of House Rept. 113-460 to create a program that would give military communities that suffer from significant traffic problems caused by base population increases to compete for $200 million in grants to improve transportation infrastructure.

action.text: By unanimous consent, the Heck (WA) amendment was withdrawn.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A014) offered by Mr. Heck (WA).
